  • Classes in org.apache.cassandra.net used by org.apache.cassandra.net 
    Class and Description
    AsyncOneResponse
    A callback specialized for returning a value from a single target; that is, this is for messages that we only send to one recipient.
    BackPressureState
    Interface meant to track the back-pressure state per replica host.
    BackPressureStrategy
    Back-pressure algorithm interface.
    CallbackInfo
    Encapsulates the callback information.
    IAsyncCallback
    implementors of IAsyncCallback need to make sure that any public methods are threadsafe with respect to response() being called from the message service.
    IAsyncCallbackWithFailure 
    IMessageSink

    IVerbHandler provides the method that all verb handlers need to implement.

    MBean exposing MessagingService metrics plus allowing to enable/disable back-pressure.

    OutboundTcpConnectionPool 
    PingMessage
    A backport of the version from 4.0, intentionnaly added as versions 4.0 or greater aren't guaranteed to know the c* versions they communicate with before they connect.
